title: enthO mahaanubaavuDavu
sahitya:
entO mahAnubhAvuDavu nIvenO cakkani dEvuDavu rAma





anupallavi



 vintalu jEsiti vilOkamandu santata bhadrAdri svAmi rAmacandra





caraNam 1



 toli vElpu jAmbvantugA jEsinAvu mali vElpu pavanajugA jEsinAvu 

velayu sUryu sugrIvugA jEsinAvu ala sarva surula gOtula jEsinAvu rAma

   



caraNam 2



 kAraNa shrI sItagA jEsinAvu garima shESuni lakSmaNugA jEsinAvu 

yAreNTini bharata shatrughnula jEsinAvu nArAyaNa nIvu naruDainAvu rAma

   



caraNam 3



 rAtiki prANamu kAnandiccinnAvu nAti yengili kAnandiccinAvu

kOti mUkalanella kolipincinAvu nITipai koNDala nilipincinAvu rAma

   



caraNam 4



 lankapai daNDEtti lagga yekkinAvu rAvaNa kumbhakarNula druncinAvu 

pankajAkSi sItanu pAlincinAvu lankEshu divya pSpaka mekkinAvu rAma

   



caraNam 5



 paraganayOdhyaku baratencinAvu paTTAbhiSiktuDai pAlincinAvu 

vara bhadra giriyandu vasiyincinAvu dharalO rAmadAsuni dayalEninAvu rAma
